p.s: Driving slowly below the speed limit can be a great way to keep safe on treacherous highways , blind curves , and all sorts of other dangerous roadway hazards .
Follow these simple steps to put your safety first , before your desire to get there on time .

item.s: Maintain your speed at least below the speed limit .
This ensures you do n't go so slowly that you violate any laws applicable to where you 're driving .
The speed limits are determined by taking drivers ' speeding tendencies into account , and safe , experienced drivers know to slow down substantially in rain or snowy conditions .

item.s: Watch for speed limit changes and adjust accordingly .
Also , check the weather and the relative density of cars on the road .
Another variable you need to keep track of is the width of the road , which will give you an idea of how much space you have to maneuver .
Wider roads are o. k. for going slightly faster .

figure.rend: Drive Below the Speed Limit Step 2 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Use your own judgement .
Speed limits are an upper limit , and lower limits may exist based on the local laws , but speed is ultimately your decision .
Know what your car is capable of and watch how your car 's steering responds to the speed of the car .
The average car needs about of braking distance to come to a complete stop from ( miles per hour ) .

item.s: Keep in mind how much you want to avoid an accident .
This cannot be stressed enough

figure.rend: Drive Below the Speed Limit Step 4 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Avoid freeways if at all possible .
If you must use freeways , please stick to the right lane , and let the faster traffic pass you , even if they are driving above the speed limit .

figure.rend: Drive Below the Speed Limit Step 5 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Stay out of the fast lane .
This lane is reserved for passing and fast drivers .
You will incur less hostility if you stay in the right lane .

figure.rend: Drive Below the Speed Limit Step 6 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Avoid rush hour .
At this time , drivers are most reluctant to be caught behind you

figure.rend: Drive Below the Speed Limit Step 7 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Get a substantially less powerful car .
This way , you will not be tempted to pass the speed limit .

figure.rend: Drive Below the Speed Limit Step 8 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Get in touch with other drivers who respect the speed limit .
Form a club or association to establish more clout in persuading local authorities to enforce the speed limit .
Find a new job closer to home .
This way , you can make up for the lost time in your commute .

Do n't drive with an uncalibrated speedometer .
It is important to know exactly how fast you are going .
